title: Flying Over the City
excerpt: I was flying over a glowing cityscape, feeling completely free.
content: I soared through neon-lit towers. [[Below|3DS XL]], tiny people watched in awe. I felt both alone and in control.

title: Endless Train Ride
excerpt:
The train
kept going with no stops, and strange passengers joined in.
content: Each car I walked into had its own logic. Some were dreamlike, others felt like memories.

title: Chasing Shadows
excerpt: I was running through a foggy forest, chasing shadows that danced around me.
content: The shadows whispered secrets as I chased them deeper into the woods, feeling both fear and curiosity.

title: Lost in a Library
excerpt: I wandered through an endless library filled with books that whispered their stories.
content: Each book I opened transported me to a different world, but I could never find my way out.  [[Endless Train Ride]]
